SEARCH

Package cz.cuni.mff.java.drawing

package cz.cuni.mff.java.drawing
This package implements a simple GUI drawing tool.

The application is launched from the Main class.

The application window consists of a menu panel and DrawPanel with an image. The top menu provides basic file operations on the image.

The drawing is handled by various Pen and ShapePen implementations, which are parametrized by the settings controlled from the left menu panel. There are some provided default pens, and the app is also extendable via plugins in the /Plugins directory.

For information about plugins, refer to the user docs, the Pen and ShapePen classes as well as the PluginLoader class.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BasicPen
    A simple implementation of Pen for drawing basic strokes.
    CirclePen
    Concrete implementation of ShapePen for drawing circles and ellipses.
    DoublePen
    An implementation of Pen for drawing double line strokes.
    DrawPanel
    A JPanel subclass used for displaying and interacting with a drawable image.
    DrawPanelSettings
    A class that encapsulates the settings for configuring a DrawPanel.
    LinePen
    Concrete implementation of ShapePen for drawing lines.
    Main
    Main class of the application.
    Pen
    Abstract class which defines the basic API for drawing tools.
    PenButton
    A JToggleButton that represents a drawing pen tool with a graphical icon.
    PenSettings
    A class representing the settings used for configuring the appearance of a Pen implementation.
    PictureLoader
    Utility class for loading, saving, and creating image files.
    PluginLoader
    A class responsible for loading and managing plugins for drawing pens.
    RainbowPen
    An implementation of Pen for drawing a rainbow-colored stroke.
    RectangleFillPen
    Concrete implementation of ShapePen for drawing filled rectangles.
    RectanglePen
    Concrete implementation of ShapePen for drawing rectangles.
    ShapePen
    Abstract class representing a pen specifically designed for drawing shapes.
